long_description: gallows point resort is a distinctive caribbean resort located in st. john, us virgin islands, offering you sweeping panoramic views and stunning sunsets from its private oceanfront location on a lushly landscaped 5-acre peninsula. offering newly renovated, one bedroom ocean-front villas, a gift & gourmet coffee shop, concierge service, and fine-dining at the highly-proclaimed onsite restaurant, ocean 362, the resort was especially designed with your vacation experience in mind. for a fine dining experience, our onsite restaurant, ocean 362, is open nightly for dinner. we offer more amenities, staff, and services than any other accommodation in cruz bay: 24/7 front desk services, full time maintenance and housekeeping staffs, complimentary arrival & departure shuttles, food and wine provisioning services, concierge services, bellman services, and more. gallows point resort is also the perfect venue for your destination wedding. with dramatic ocean views and lush tropical landscaping â€“ the resort is a photographer's dream.
